channel.title: Someone Help Me This Time
channel.description:
Okay I don't have a shitty computer or connection, but people keep doing this on my server : [code]Disconnected Silentrain, Data transfer timeout. ClientHandler: Client Silentrain disconnected (h75-100-203-60.prrymi.dsl.dynamic .tds.net) Connection from h75-100-203-60.prrymi.dsl.dynamic.tds.net:50369 [client-1-Silentrain]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 6 ms] [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org[/code]
And for some reason people can only challenge each other to a duel in the wild. And when they're in the duel they can't attack each other. This is 317 delta base.
I searched for the "data transfer time out" and here's what it says. [code] public boolean packetProcess() { if (disconnected || destruct) { return false; } try { if (timeOutCounter++ > 20/* && logoutButton*/) { misc.println("Disconnected "+playerName+", Data transfer timeout."); disconnected = true; return false; }[/code] And also this happens: [code]Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Silentrain. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13304) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19742) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:274) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error with player 1, Silentrain java.lang.NullPointerException at client.declineTrade(client.java:10919) at client.declineTrade(client.java:10890) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Silentrain ClientHandler: Client Silentrain disconnected (h75-100-203-60.prrymi.dsl.dynamic .tds.net)[/code] This is all in the run.bat btw.

item.title: Someone Help Me This Time
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I’m having trouble with this too, anyone?

Read full topic

I don’t think that’s the problem.

item.title: Someone Help Me This Time
item.dc:creator: @revol_2 revol 2
item.description:
@revol_2 wrote:

you did check if you had any errors with your IP ? maybe something wrong with it , try deleting your host on no-ip.com and re-make it. I don’t know just try stupids things like that and maybe you’ll find it

Read full topic

item.title: Someone Help Me This Time
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay I don’t have a shitty computer or connection, but people keep doing this on my server : Disconnected Silentrain, Data transfer timeout. ClientHandler: Client Silentrain disconnected (h75-100-203-60.prrymi.dsl.dynamic .tds.net) Connection from h75-100-203-60.prrymi.dsl.dynamic.tds.net:50369 [client-1-Silentrain]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 6 ms] [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org [client-1-Silentrain]: Invalid Server: sagescape.no-ip.org

And for some reason people can only challenge each other to a duel in the wild. And when they’re in the duel they can’t attack each other. This is 317 delta base.

I searched for the “data transfer time out” and here’s what it says. public boolean packetProcess() { if (disconnected || destruct) { return false; } try { if (timeOutCounter++ > 20/* && logoutButton*/) { misc.println("Disconnected "+playerName+", Data transfer timeout."); disconnected = true; return false; }
And also this happens: Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Silentrain. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13304) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19742) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:274) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error with player 1, Silentrain java.lang.NullPointerException at client.declineTrade(client.java:10919) at client.declineTrade(client.java:10890) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Silentrain ClientHandler: Client Silentrain disconnected (h75-100-203-60.prrymi.dsl.dynamic .tds.net) This is all in the run.bat btw.

Read full topic
